Class Operator:Remove Method

Short Name: Class Operator.Remove

Requires: VI Scripting

Class: Application Methods

To Use: Create a method.

Removes the operator VI associated with the specified class. Returns FALSE if it does not find the operator VI.

Parameters

Data typeNameRequiredDescription
Class NameYesThe class of the operator VI.
Operator NameYesName of the operator VI.
VI ReferenceNoThe reference to the operator VI.

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this method.

Data type
Available in Run-Time EngineYes (Read/Write)
Available in Real-Time Operating SystemYes
Remote access allowedNo
